post:
<center>![](http://www.royalpark.fr/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/Royal-Park-PROMOTION.gif)

Our promotional site is still alive and a great place to grab a bargain if you are confident in the services we provide and happy to purchase low cost KVM VPS with a no refund clause.

If you are a new client and feel more secure with a refund policy available, please view and purchase our [regular plans](https://kvm.doctor/kvm-vps) which have a 7 day refund guarantee allowing you to test our network and your instance to be sure the Doc and his services are a perfect fit for you and your projects. Use discount code "TAKE15OFF" for 15% off regular pricing.

We offer a wide range of services from IPv6 only VPS, Hybrid Dedicated KVM VPS, Storage VPS, Resource Pools, Dual Storage etc. If you require a custom plan or a service type not featured in this ad, feel free to request it and our nursing staff shall do the heavy lifting.
![](https://media.giphy.com/media/Om44g5KdpbHQA/giphy.gif)

<font color="red">The plans on this site change once every</font><font color="blue"> blue</font><font color="red"> moon and have limited stock.</font>

<u><b><font size="5">FEATURES</font></b></u>
Nested Virtualisation (Most Nodes)
Up to 10gbps Network Port
DDoS Mitigation
Multiple Locations
Virtualizor Control Panel
Easily Scale Resources
On Demand Backup (once a month)
On Demand Restore (once a month)
Enterprise Hardware
IPv6 (USA Only)
Multiple OS And ISO Options
24/7 Support

<u><b><font size="5">Distributions</font></b></u>
CentOS
Suse
Ubuntu
Scientific
Debian
Fedora
